name: Emergency Care
short_description: Bangladesh Navy Specialized  Hospital has all the characteristics of a world-classdoctor/consultant. In OPD, clinical consultation is provided to patients.

name: Call Center 24/7
short_description: Patients are registered at the reception and are seen on first come, first serve basis. Patients have the right to consult any doctor/consultant. In OPD, clinical consultation is provided to patients.

name: Blood Test
short_description: The Division of Clinical Hematology conducts clinical research and provides comprehensive treatment and care for children and adolescents with malignant and non-malignant hematological disorders.

name: Outdoor Checkup
short_description: Bangladesh specialized Hospital EMERGENCY DEPARTMENT is a state if art emergency dept. of Bangladesh.This department is staffed with skilled physicians, nurses and other medical staffs who are specialized in emergency patient.

name: Cardiac Surgery
short_description: Founded in mid-2016, the Cardiac surgery department of Bangladesh Specialized Hospital boasts a strong team, the members of which are veterans in their fields who have gained considerable professional experience in cardiac surgery.

name: Dental Care
short_description: Bangladesh Specialized Hospital Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery Clinic are dedicated to ensuring individualized quality patient care and customized treatment planning. We provide the highest quality care using the safest, most effective treatments.

name: Ophthalmology
short_description: We have an international standard Oncology center with experienced & trained physicians and expert nurses along with all modern equipment for investigation facilities for early diagnosis of cancer and comprehensive cancer treatment.

name: Heart disease
short_description: The Department of Cardiology provides a broad range of services in the diagnosis and management of heart disease. The department comprises a strong team of doctors from various cardiac sub-specialties to treat all types of heart disease.

name: Hepatology
short_description: The Department of Urology at Bangladesh Specialized Hospital is dedicated to providing state-of-the-art medical and surgical care for all specialties of male and female urology (both adult and pediatric.

name: Huntington's
short_description: The Department of Neuro Medicine at the BSHL is dedicated to exceptional patient care center is fortunate to have state-of-the-art facilities for evaluating patients with neurological diseases, performing the latest clinical and basic science.

name: Otology
short_description: ENT Department of Bangladesh Specialized Hospital offers comprehensive treatment for a wide range of patients who need surgical or conservative treatments for the nasal passages, sinuses, ears, mouth, pharynx, throat, and head-neck regions.

name: Child Care's
short_description: The Department of Pediatric Surgery at Bangladesh Specialized Hospital is well equipped to handle all kind of elective and emergency pediatric and neonatal surgeries.
